text: ane jyare ame isra'ilana santanathi vacana lidhum ke tame allaha sivaya bijani bandagi na karaso ane mata-pita sathe sad vartana karaso ane evi ja rite saga-sambandhi'o, anatho ane lacaro sathe ane lokone bhali vata kaheso, namajani pabandi karata raheso ane jhakata apata raheso parantu thodaka loko sivaya tame sau phari gaya ane modhum pheravi lidhum
